title: Master Strike
text:
''Trigger'' Your [[Strike]] hits a [[Flat-Footed]] creature and deals damage.

The target attempts a [[Fortitude]] save at your class DC. 

It then becomes temporarily immune to your Master Strike for 1 day.

{{||SaveSuccessTable}}
s-hit: The target is [[Enfeebled]] 2 until the end of your next turn.
s-fumble: The target is [[Paralyzed]] for 4 rounds, knocked [[Unconscious]] for 2 hours, or killed (your choice).
